About.title: About me
About.description: I've started out in the gaming industry as a game tester, working towards software testing. Then I got interested in programming while creating automated tests, which I enjoyed a lot. Fast-forward today, I've had the privilege of learning a lot by developing functionalities and applications.

A list of technologies I've worked with.title: Tools and platforms
bullets: Git, Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, Kafka, RabbitMq,Redis, ElasticSearch, Jenkins, Kibana,Sentry, NewRelic, Webpack, Jira

eMag.title: PHP Developer
bullets: Written robust and performant code for different internal projects
Worked with PHP Symfony framework for backend development, Javascript, HTML, CSS for front-end functionalities
Used Docker to containerize several applications and Kubernetes to deploy them on internal cloud infrastructure
Created make, bash scripts and automated deployment pipelines in order to deploy applications in production environment
Analyzed and designed architectural documentations for upcoming projects

eMag.title: QA Engineer
bullets: Designed Test Plans and Test cases
Implemented automated test suites in Codeception

Ubisoft.title: Dev Tester
bullets: Designed Test Plans and Test cases
Close communication with the developers during all stages of development life cycle

Contact.title: Get in touch
Contact.description: I am not actively looking for a change right now, but my inbox is always open.
